summary: Ensure the PHP SDK does not retry 'internal' errors that should not be retried according to gRPC error classification. Review and update the retryable client error codes list.
userImpact: Users may experience unnecessary retries of operations that should fail immediately, leading to increased latency and resource consumption.
rootCause: The retryable client error codes list may include 'internal' errors that should not be retried according to gRPC specifications.
proposedFix: Review and correct the list of retryable client codes in BaseClient.php to exclude internal errors that should not be retried.
resolutionDetails: The retryable error codes list was reviewed and updated to properly exclude internal errors.
keyQuote: See the list of retryable client codes: https://github.com/temporalio/sdk-php/blob/master/src/Client/GRPC/BaseClient.php#L22
